ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lsm01.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 2 |  | lsm01.p | |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_subgrcl | |- ( X e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_0subg | |- ( G e. Grp -> { .0. } e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( X e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> { .0. } e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_id | |- ( X e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> X e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_subg0cl | |- ( X e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> .0. e. X ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_snssd | |- ( X e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> { .0. } C_ X ) |
| 9 | 2 | #P_lsmss1 | |- ( ( { .0. } e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ { .0. } C_ X ) -> ( { .0. } .(+) X ) = X ) |
| 10 | 5, 6, 8, 9 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( X e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> ( { .0. } .(+) X ) = X ) |
